WRITING.TEXT: But by then you could bounce to the Far East with your riches, wait a few generations and buy several countries back from the Dutch as their empire was collapsing. I mean, we're going back in time and immortal. It doesn't matter your ancestors at that point, you've got all the cards needed to fuck shit up
It also helps with the calming down thing, especially if you are of the panic disorder type... Also whiskey is tasty
For some reason this made me think Eyedea Abilities Color my World Mine
